com.github.nirmalpatidar123.anim

Class AnimationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nirmalpatidar123.anim.AnimationFactory

  • public final class AnimationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for creating Animation objects for some of the most common animation, including a 3D flip animation, FlipAnimation. Furthermore, utility methods are provided for initiating fade-in-then-out and flip animations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnimationFactory.FlipDirection
      The FlipDirection enumeration defines the most typical flip view transitions: left-to-right and right-to-left.

    • Constructor Summary

      AnimationFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • flipAnimation

        public static android.view.animation.Animation[] flipAnimation(android.view.View fromView,
                                                               android.view.View toView,
                                                               AnimationFactory.FlipDirection dir,
                                                               long duration,
                                                               android.view.animation.Interpolator interpolator)
        Create a pair of FlipAnimation that can be used to flip 3D transition from fromView to toView. A typical use case is with ViewAnimator as an out and in transition. NOTE: Avoid using this method. Instead, use flipTransition(android.widget.ViewAnimator, com.github.nirmalpatidar123.anim.AnimationFactory.FlipDirection).
        Parameters:
        fromView - the view transition away from
        toView - the view transition to
        dir - the flip direction
        duration - the transition duration in milliseconds
        interpolator - the interpolator to use (pass null to use the AccelerateInterpolator interpolator)
        Returns:

      • flipTransition

        public static void flipTransition(android.widget.ViewAnimator viewAnimator,
                                  AnimationFactory.FlipDirection dir)
        Flip to the next view of the ViewAnimator's subviews. A call to this method will initiate a FlipAnimation to show the next View. If the currently visible view is the last view, flip direction will be reversed for this transition.
        Parameters:
        viewAnimator - the ViewAnimator
        dir - the direction of flip

      • inFromLeftAnimation

        public static android.view.animation.Animation inFromLeftAnimation(long duration,
                                                                   android.view.animation.Interpolator interpolator)
        Slide animations to enter a view from left.
        Parameters:
        duration - the animation duration in milliseconds
        interpolator - the interpolator to use (pass null to use the AccelerateInterpolator interpolator)
        Returns:
        a slide transition animation

                                                               long delay)
        A fade animation that will fade the subject in by changing alpha from 0 to 1
        Parameters:

        delay - how long to wait before starting the animation, in milliseconds

        a fade animation

      • fadeInAnimation

        public static android.view.animation.Animation fadeInAnimation(long duration,
                                                               android.view.View view)
        A fade animation that will ensure the View starts and ends with the correct visibility
        Parameters:
        view - the View to be faded in
        duration - the animation duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a fade animation that will set the visibility of the view at the start and end of animation

      • fadeOutAnimation

        public static android.view.animation.Animation fadeOutAnimation(long duration,
                                                                android.view.View view)
        A fade animation that will ensure the View starts and ends with the correct visibility
        Parameters:
        view - the View to be faded out
        duration - the animation duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a fade animation that will set the visibility of the view at the start and end of animation

      • fadeInThenOutAnimation

        public static android.view.animation.Animation[] fadeInThenOutAnimation(long duration,
                                                                        long delay)
        Creates a pair of animation that will fade in, delay, then fade out
        Parameters:
        duration - the animation duration in milliseconds
        delay - how long to wait after fading in the subject and before starting the fade out
        Returns:
        a fade in then out animations

      • fadeOut

        public static void fadeOut(android.view.View v)
        Fades the view in. Animation starts right away.
        Parameters:
        v - the view to be faded in

      • fadeIn

        public static void fadeIn(android.view.View v)
        Fades the view out. Animation starts right away.
        Parameters:
        v - the view to be faded out

      • fadeInThenOut

        public static void fadeInThenOut(android.view.View v,
                                 long delay)
        Fades the view in, delays the specified amount of time, then fades the view out
        Parameters:
        v - the view to be faded in then out
        delay - how long the view will be visible for
